name: LAION-400M
desc: Formerly known as crawling@home (C@H), we have created an openly accessible 400M image-text-pair dataset. This is the predecessor of LAION-5B. Explore our already released samples (400M) & help us to quickly grow into the billions!

name: LAION5B
desc: To democratize research on large-scale multi-modal models, we present LAION-5B â€“ a dataset consisting of 5.85 billion CLIP-filtered image-text pairs, featuring several nearest neighbor indices, an improved web-interface for exploration and subset generation, and detection scores for watermark, NSFW, and toxic content detection.

name: LAION Aesthetics
desc: Laion5B subset with aesthetic > 7 pwatermark < 0.8 punsafe < 0.5
